data.name: RXC - Rally Cross Challenge Demo
data.detailed_description: RXC - Alpha demo gives the players a chance to try out the handling of the vehicles in a time trial event or free roam. They also can play multiplayer with friends in time trials, lapped or timed races along with freeroam.
data.about_the_game: RXC - Alpha demo gives the players a chance to try out the handling of the vehicles in a time trial event or free roam. They also can play multiplayer with friends in time trials, lapped or timed races along with freeroam.
data.short_description: Battle the world in reckless multiplayer races as you bash, slide, and jump your way to the checkered flag. This isn't just another top-down racing game. RXC is a physics-based racing simulation with a robust damage system, dynamic traction model, and an authentic rally feel.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1
  • Processor: AMD FX 6300 3.5Ghz / Intel Core i3-6300 3.8Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7750 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1700 3.0Ghz / Intel Core i7-6700 3.4Ghz (or better)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 290 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
